name: Lequm
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
diet focused on salted fish and seaweed preserves
informal barter customs at dawn markets
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or mind-control magics
navigational auguries assist but don't replace seamanship
notes: economy tied to reagent transit and small-scale maritime trade
limited combustion industry; workshops rely on hand-powered tech
